Text:
[II] Glorify and pray with sincere hearts to Christ, who gives His firmness and strength to His people:
[IR] Lord hear us and we will praise You forever.
[I1] Christ, our strength, you have called your faithful to your truth,
[I2] in your mercy, give us faith and perseverance.
[I1] Lord, with your heart of peace, direct those with power to govern
[I2] inspiring in them courage and wisdom to lead us into peace.
[I1] With the little you had, you satisfied the crowds by multiplying the bread,
[I2] so teach us to use our riches to help the hungry and needy.
[I1] Move those wielding power to not only care for their own people and lands,
[I2] but to respect everyone, care for all people, and protect our shared planet.
[I1] Grant our siblings in Christ who have fallen asleep the resurrection and blessings
[I2] when you come to be glorified in all things.
Changes: 2023-10-16 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions
